评论详情: The lace was a little tight but not terrible and it wore out a little bit through-out the time I was wearing them ( I wore them to a 5/6 hour concert). Very soft and comfortable otherwise but does ride up in front AND back if you’re not careful. They were a little too long for me but that’s not an issue, I’m short so that’s normal.

评论概述: Love these pants!!! But wash it before trying them on because it might stain your skin
评论详情: Wash before wearing, I tried it on when it arrived and it left a blue and black stain on my legs. Other than that they are amazing, they are so cute and comfortable!
I wanted these to be so much more. At a glance they're so cute, but soo cheap. Mine had a hole in them by the lace, had to return before even wearing once.
Seemed cheaply made and the lace was very itchy and had no give to it.
Perfect length for bell bottom pants fabric is nice and fit so comfortably!

评论概述: Lace not stretchy, bad for curvy girls
评论详情: I ordered these in my usual size and the legging part fits but the lace cut outs are not stretchy so they are tight on my thighs. It ruins the whole look. I think that sizing up would only make them look baggy. They're cute but I don't think they're for curvy girls

I bought these for world goth day, we were going to a picnic. I would say they are true to size, although they were a little snug around the knees but nothing uncomfortable. I got lots of compliments on them.
Perfect cozy and comfortable definitely look great feels nice good quality I wore them out and they were perfect quality

评论概述: Cute pants/great quality just SIZE UP
评论详情: I am a medium or 8/9 in all pants and the medium was much too small. Just size up and you’ll be fine.

评论概述: Don’t buy if you are very small!
评论详情: I wear XS or XXS 79lbs and 4”11 even the sizing is too big not way to make waist small enough by sewing and the lace gets ruined fast from being way too long
So comfy and gorgeous! Size chart was perfectly correct & they shipped fast! Great quality as well!
